While not as creative or challenging as its predecessor, Half Life 2 is still a really enjoyable game. I don't know what to say other than this game defines the FPS genre. If you're looking for a new shooter, you have every reason to get this one!

An amazing, legendary game. It would be really cool if there was some sort of sequel to this game, but the ending was wrapped up so neatly with no cliffhangers or lingering questions whatsoever that I couldn't possibly imagine what could be in such a sequel.

This is my favorite game of all time! I know it says i have very few hours in the game, but that's because I previously owned The Orange Box on my Xbox, which I played heavily and beat multiple times. 

This game has an excellent story and great puzzles, although compared to today's standards the graphics are a little dated. I personally don't think that matters, but for those who think it does, there is a mod available on ModDB called MMod, which overhauls the games visauls and combat while still staying true to the base Half Life 2 experience.

beautiful graphic for it's age, and great story.
